page.title: 05Recreation continued
page.content:
They meet on Tuesday and Thursday evenings for Colts and Seniors.Senior teams play every Saturday during the season and on the occassional Sunday, and the Junior sides play every Sunday.You don't have to be a certain age to join the club but the teams are under 8 to under 15 and the colts and seniors.The senior players pay Â£15.00 and Â£8.00 for social.The Juniors pay Â£6.00 per annum.At the club there is a social bar.There are no other facilities but the club continues through closed season with social events and weekly hash runs.
Many people in this area make use of sports facilities just outside this D-Block,such as{Farnham Sports Centre and the Bourne Club.
